project_plan.name: Simple Text-Based Game in Python
project_plan.description: Develop a simple text-based game where players navigate through different rooms, pick up items, view their inventory, and encounter challenges.

task.name: Design the game structure (rooms, items, and challenges)
Implement functionality to pick up items
Implement simple challenges (e.g., puzzles or enemies)
Write tests for each feature implemented above
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure that they function correctly
